name: Twitter
description: The Twitter Connector allows you to work with Twitter, a social networking site where users broadcast short posts with 280 characters known as 'Tweets'. The connector uses the Twitter REST API v2.0 to work with Tweets, users, lists, and direct messages.

operations.name: getTweetsLookup
operations.description: Get Tweets Lookup

params.name: ids
params.description: A comma separated list of Tweet IDs. Up to 100 are allowed in a single request.

params.name: expansions
params.description: Additional fields required in the response.

params.name: media_fields
params.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific media fields will deliver.

params.name: place_fields
params.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific place fields will deliver.

params.name: poll_fields
params.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific poll fields will deliver.

params.name: tweet_fields
params.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific Tweet fields will deliver.

params.name: user_fields
params.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific user fields will deliver.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Variable name to store the response payload.

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the current message payload with the operation response.

operations.name: getUsersLookup
operations.description: Get Users Lookup

params.name: ids
params.description: A comma separated list of User IDs. Up to 100 comma-separated User IDs can be looked up using this method.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Variable name to store the response payload.

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the current message payload with the operation response.

operations.name: getDirectMessages
operations.description: Get Direct Messages

params.name: event_types
params.description: Comma-separated list of Direct Message event types to return (e.g., message_create).

params.name: max_results
params.description: Maximum number of events to return per page (10-100).

params.name: pagination_token
params.description: Token used to navigate forward or backward through result pages.

params.name: expansions
params.description: Additional resource expansions to include in the response.

params.name: dm_event_fields
params.description: Direct Message event fields to include in the response.

params.name: media_fields
params.description: Media object fields to include in the response.

params.name: tweet_fields
params.description: Tweet fields to include when events reference Tweets.

params.name: user_fields
params.description: User object fields to include in the response.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Variable name to store the response payload.

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the current message payload with the response.

operations.name: getUserHomeTimeline
operations.description: Get User Home Timeline

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the Twitter user.

params.name: end_time
params.description: The newest, most recent UTC timestamp to which the Tweets will be provided.

params.name: max_results
params.description: The maximum number of results to be returned per page.

params.name: pagination_token
params.description: This parameter is used to move forwards or backwards through 'pages' of results.

params.name: since_id
params.description: Returns results with a Tweet ID greater (more recent) than the specified ID.

params.name: start_time
params.description: The oldest UTC timestamp (from most recent 7 days) from which the Tweets will be given.

params.name: until_id
params.description: Returns results with a Tweet ID less than (that is, older than) the specified ID.

params.name: exclude
params.description: Comma-separated list of the types of Tweets to exclude from the response.

params.name: expansions
params.description: Additional fields required in the response.

params.name: media_fields
params.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific media fields will deliver.

params.name: place_fields
params.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific place fields will deliver.

params.name: poll_fields
params.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific poll fields will deliver.

params.name: tweet_fields
params.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific Tweet fields will deliver.

params.name: user_fields
params.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific user fields will deliver.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Variable name to store the response payload.

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the current message payload with the operation response.

operations.name: addDirectMessage
operations.description: Add Direct Message

params.name: dm_conversation_id
params.description: The unique identifier (dm_conversation_id) of the conversation that will receive the Direct Message.

params.name: attachments
params.description: A JSON array containing media objects to attach. Example: `[ { "media_id": "1456789" } ]`

params.name: text
params.description: Text content of the Direct Message.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the operation response will be assigned.

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the current message payload with the operation response (removes it from the above variable).

operations.name: createTweet
operations.description: Create Tweet

params.name: direct_message_deep_link
params.description: URL that opens a Direct Message conversation with an account.

params.name: for_super_followers_only
params.description: Tweet exclusively for Super Followers.

params.name: geo
params.description: JSON object with location information for the Tweet.

params.name: media
params.description: JSON object describing media IDs attached to the Tweet.

params.name: poll
params.description: JSON object defining poll options and duration.

params.name: quote_tweet_id
params.description: ID of the Tweet being quoted.

params.name: reply
params.description: JSON object containing information about the Tweet being replied to.

params.name: reply_settings
params.description: Who can reply: everyone (default), mentionedUsers, or following.

params.name: text
params.description: Text content of the Tweet (280-character limit).

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Variable name to store the response payload.

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the current message payload with the operation response.

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the Twitter connection.

params.name: apiUrl
params.description: The URL of the Twitter REST API. If not specified, defaults to https://api.twitter.com

params.name: timeout
params.description: Timeout duration of the API request in milliseconds. If not specified, defaults to 5000ms

params.name: clientId
params.description: User ID that allows you to use OAuth 2.0 as an authentication method.

params.name: clientSecret
params.description: Client secret for OAuth 2.0 authentication. Required for automatic token refresh functionality.

params.name: accessToken
params.description: Value of the Access Token to access the API via request. If not provided, will be obtained using refresh token

params.name: refreshToken
params.description: Value of the refresh token used to obtain new access tokens when the current one expires

operations.name: init
operations.description: Common method having the configurations applicable to all the methods in the connector.

operations.name: callWithRetry
operations.description: Templating the API call with retry option.

operations.name: callOptions
operations.description: Templating the http call types GET, POST, PUT and DELETE.

operations.name: getAccessToken
operations.description: Get an access token by calling the Twitter refresh token endpoint.

operations.name: addDirectMessage
operations.description: Creates a Direct Message on behalf of an authenticated user, and adds it to the specified conversation.

operations.name: getDirectMessages
operations.description: Returns a list of Direct Messages for the authenticated user, both sent and received. Direct Message events are returned in reverse chronological order. Supports retrieving events from the previous 30 days.

operations.name: sendNewDirectMessage
operations.description: Sends a new direct message to the specified user from the authenticating user.

operations.name: createList
operations.description: Creates a new list for the authenticated user.

operations.name: deleteList
operations.description: Deletes a list for the authenticated user.

operations.name: getFollowingLists
operations.description: Retrieves all lists the authenticating or specified user is following, including their own.

operations.name: getListById
operations.description: Retrieves information about a single Tweet specified by the requested ID.

operations.name: getListsMemberships
operations.description: Retrieves all Lists a specified user is a member of.

operations.name: updateList
operations.description: Updates an existing list for the authenticated user.

operations.name: blockUser
operations.description: Blocks a specified user.

operations.name: followUser
operations.description: Follows a specified user.

operations.name: getBlockedUsers
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users who are blocked by the specified user ID.

operations.name: getFollowers
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users who are followers of the specified user ID.

operations.name: getFollowingUsers
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users who are followed by the specified user ID.

operations.name: getMe
operations.description: Retrieves information about the authorized user.

operations.name: getMutedUsers
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users who are muted by the specified user ID.

operations.name: getUserById
operations.description: Retrieves information about a single user specified by the requested ID.

operations.name: getUserByUsername
operations.description: Retrieves information about a single user specified by the requested username.

operations.name: getUsersLookup
operations.description: Retrieves information about one or more users specified by the requested IDs.

operations.name: muteUser
operations.description: Mutes a specified user.

operations.name: unblockUser
operations.description: Unblocks a specified user.

operations.name: unfollowUser
operations.description: Unfollows a specified user.

operations.name: unmuteUser
operations.description: Unmutes a specified user.

operations.name: createRetweet
operations.description: Retweets a Tweet.

operations.name: createTweet
operations.description: Create a Tweet.

operations.name: deleteTweet
operations.description: Delete a Tweet when given the Tweet ID.

operations.name: getLikedTweetsList
operations.description: Retrieves a list of liked Tweets of the specified user ID.

operations.name: searchTweets
operations.description: Retrieves a collection of tweets that meet the specified search criteria.

operations.name: getTweetById
operations.description: Retrieves information about a single Tweet specified by the requested ID.

operations.name: getTweetsLookup
operations.description: Retrieves information about one or more Tweets specified by the requested IDs.

operations.name: getUserHomeTimeline
operations.description: Retrieves a collection of most recent Tweets and Retweets posted by you and users you follow. This endpoint can return every Tweet created on a timeline over the last 7 days as well as the most recent 800 regardless of creation date.

operations.name: getUserMentionsTimeline
operations.description: Retrieves Tweets mentioning a single user specified by the requested user ID. By default, the most recent ten Tweets are returned per request. Using pagination, up to the most recent 800 Tweets can be retrieved.

operations.name: getUserTweetsTimeline
operations.description: Retrieves Tweets composed by a single user, specified by the requested user ID. By default, the most recent ten Tweets are returned per request. Using pagination, the most recent 3,200 Tweets can be retrieved.

operations.name: likeTweet
operations.description: Allows a user to like a Tweet.

operations.name: unlikeTweet
operations.description: Allows a user to unlike a Tweet that was previously liked.

operations.name: init
operations.description: Common method having the configurations applicable to all the methods in the connector.

operations.name: callWithRetry
operations.description: Templating the API call with retry option.

operations.name: callOptions
operations.description: Templating the http call types GET, POST, PUT and DELETE.

operations.name: getAccessToken
operations.description: Get an access token by calling the Twitter refresh token endpoint.

operations.name: addDirectMessage
operations.description: Creates a Direct Message on behalf of an authenticated user, and adds it to the specified conversation.

operations.name: getDirectMessages
operations.description: Returns a list of Direct Messages for the authenticated user, both sent and received. Direct Message events are returned in reverse chronological order. Supports retrieving events from the previous 30 days.

operations.name: sendNewDirectMessage
operations.description: Sends a new direct message to the specified user from the authenticating user.

operations.name: createList
operations.description: Creates a new list for the authenticated user.

operations.name: deleteList
operations.description: Deletes a list for the authenticated user.

operations.name: getFollowingLists
operations.description: Retrieves all lists the authenticating or specified user is following, including their own.

operations.name: getListById
operations.description: Retrieves information about a single Tweet specified by the requested ID.

operations.name: getListsMemberships
operations.description: Retrieves all Lists a specified user is a member of.

operations.name: updateList
operations.description: Updates an existing list for the authenticated user.

operations.name: blockUser
operations.description: Blocks a specified user.

operations.name: followUser
operations.description: Follows a specified user.

operations.name: getBlockedUsers
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users who are blocked by the specified user ID.

operations.name: getFollowers
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users who are followers of the specified user ID.

operations.name: getFollowingUsers
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users who are followed by the specified user ID.

operations.name: getMe
operations.description: Retrieves information about the authorized user.

operations.name: getMutedUsers
operations.description: Retrieves a list of users who are muted by the specified user ID.

operations.name: getUserById
operations.description: Retrieves information about a single user specified by the requested ID.

operations.name: getUserByUsername
operations.description: Retrieves information about a single user specified by the requested username.

operations.name: getUsersLookup
operations.description: Retrieves information about one or more users specified by the requested IDs.

operations.name: muteUser
operations.description: Mutes a specified user.

operations.name: unblockUser
operations.description: Unblocks a specified user.

operations.name: unfollowUser
operations.description: Unfollows a specified user.

operations.name: unmuteUser
operations.description: Unmutes a specified user.

operations.name: createRetweet
operations.description: Retweets a Tweet.

operations.name: createTweet
operations.description: Create a Tweet.

operations.name: deleteTweet
operations.description: Delete a Tweet when given the Tweet ID.

operations.name: getLikedTweetsList
operations.description: Retrieves a list of liked Tweets of the specified user ID.

operations.name: searchTweets
operations.description: Retrieves a collection of tweets that meet the specified search criteria.

operations.name: getTweetById
operations.description: Retrieves information about a single Tweet specified by the requested ID.

operations.name: getTweetsLookup
operations.description: Retrieves information about one or more Tweets specified by the requested IDs.

operations.name: getUserHomeTimeline
operations.description: Retrieves a collection of most recent Tweets and Retweets posted by you and users you follow. This endpoint can return every Tweet created on a timeline over the last 7 days as well as the most recent 800 regardless of creation date.

operations.name: getUserMentionsTimeline
operations.description: Retrieves Tweets mentioning a single user specified by the requested user ID. By default, the most recent ten Tweets are returned per request. Using pagination, up to the most recent 800 Tweets can be retrieved.

operations.name: getUserTweetsTimeline
operations.description: Retrieves Tweets composed by a single user, specified by the requested user ID. By default, the most recent ten Tweets are returned per request. Using pagination, the most recent 3,200 Tweets can be retrieved.

operations.name: likeTweet
operations.description: Allows a user to like a Tweet.

operations.name: unlikeTweet
operations.description: Allows a user to unlike a Tweet that was previously liked.
